function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased growth of bacteria and fungi in areas with higher humidity and water sources","Impact":"Potential for higher levels of harmful microbes indoors","Mitigation":"Control humidity levels and reduce water sources in indoor environments","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, moisture sensors, and ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, especially those with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Facility management and building owners"},{"Description":"Dispersal of microbes into and within the built environment","Impact":"Spread of harmful microbes throughout the indoor space","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, air filtration, and maintenance of ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C sterilization, and HEPA filters","People":"Building occupants and visitors","Owner":"Facility management and cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Unclear relative importance of different sources of indoor microbes","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and targeting key sources of indoor microbes","Mitigation":"Conduct microbial source tracking studies and implement targeted cleaning and mitigation strategies","Technologies":"Microbial DNA sequencing, microbial source tracking tools","People":"Health and safety professionals, facility managers","Owner":"Building management and research institutions"}]}
